gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Lakers 124, Hornets 118
gameRecap.excerpt: The Lakers defeated the Hornets, 124-118. Anthony Davis led the way for the Lakers with 26 points, 15 rebounds and a career-high tying 11 assists, his second triple-double of the season and third of his career, while D’Angelo Russell (28 points, five 3PM) and LeBron James (26 points, seven rebounds) added a combined 54 points in the victory. Miles Bridges tallied a career-high 41 points, along with four assists for the Hornets in the losing effort. The Lakers win their third straight game as they improve to 27-25 on the season, while the Hornets fall to 10-39.
